actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on August 11, 2023.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on August 4, 2023, at 3:31 p.m.: That the Senate passed H.R. 2670 with an amendment.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rabbi Arnold Resnicoff, Chaplain, U.S. Navy (retired), Washington, D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Andy Harris to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
